item.title: MoreThan Films Acquires Ion de Sosa’s Locarno Social Thriller ‘Balearic’ (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: International film sales agency MoreThan Films has picked up sales rights to Ion de Sosa’s “Balearic” ahead of its world premiere as part of the Filmmakers of the Present section at the Locarno Film F
